result.execSummary:
The defendant Jason P Rezarch was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. On one or more other charges, Jason P Rezarch was found not guilty. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Jason P Rezarch is presumed innocent of the not guilty charges.

  • Jason P Rezarch was found guilty of Possess w/ Intent-Amphetamine(>3-10g), a class E felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(1m)(e)2.
  • Jason P Rezarch was found guilty of Resisting or Obstructing an Officer, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.41(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

from defendant

Defendant, Jason P Rezarch, in custody, appeared with Attorney Francis Xavier Rivard.  Prosecuting attorney Andrea Amidon Nodolf.  Defendant in custody.  Janell Evan - Clerk.  3:48 pm.  Rivard makes note of some changes to PSI.  State argues sentence. 5 yrs confinement, 5 yrs supervision on ct. 1.  Count 3 - 9 months jail.  Rivard argues sentence. 

COURT:  sentences defendant as follows on Count 1- finds def eligible for substance abuse program.  Is NOT eligible to Challenge program.  

Sentence on Count 1 -
10 yrs Prison, 5 yrs Initial confinement, followed by 5 yrs Extended Supervision
Defendant is eligible for substance abuse program, $518.00 costs,
Conditions of ES:  AODA, must maintain full time school and/or employment, DNA sample and pay surcharge,
Not to possess, consume or sell controlled substances, No alcohol, Random UA's, Not to enter establishment where you need to be 21 to enter.
Credit for 163 days
Sentence Count 3 -
9 mos jail concurrent with count 1, $243.00 court costs
cc hand delivered to DA; pcto Mr. Rivard re: same
pcfr Eau Claire DOC.  They are sending PSI via interface and it will be available afte 4AM and they will also hand-deliver a copy.
